solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int climbStairs(int n) {--newline--        // base cases--newline--        if(n <= 0) return 0;--newline--        if(n == 1) return 1;--newline--        if(n == 2) return 2;--newline--        --newline--        int one_step_before = 2;--newline--        int two_steps_before = 1;--newline--        int all_ways = 0;--newline--        --newline--        for(int i=2; i<n; i++){--newline--            all_ways = one_step_before + two_steps_before;--newline--            two_steps_before = one_step_before;--newline--            one_step_before = all_ways;--newline--        }--newline--        return all_ways;--newline--    }--newline--}
